desc: Jewelry Repair Services with over 30 years of experience. DNJ Jewelry Repair refurbishes & repairs jewelry. Custom Jewelry is also available. Experience in Ring Sizing, Chain Welding/Soldering, Pearl Restringing, Diamond Replacement, Stone Tightening, Battery Replacement, Clasp Repair, Earring Back Replacement & More !

layout.text: The Best Jewelry Repair Shop in the Las Vegas Area!
